headline: School Starts Today For Survivors Of Deadly Mass Shooting In Uvalde
short_description: There is new high fencing around the Texas community's public schools that still isn't finished and a heavy police patrol that many families don't trust.

headline: U.S.: Russia To Buy Rockets, Artillery Shells From North Korea
short_description: The finding comes after the Biden administration confirmed that the Russian military in August took delivery of Iranian-manufactured drones for use in Ukraine.

headline: Harry Styles Say He Feels Like He Has 'No Idea What I'm Doing' When Acting
short_description: The "As It Was" singer said he also doesn’t see many parallels between music and acting.

headline: Michigan Secretary of State Worried About ‘Violence And Disruption’ Going Into Midterms
short_description: Jocelyn Benson said misinformation "fuels the potential for additional threats, harassment and even violence on Election Day."

headline: Citing Imminent Danger Cloudflare Drops Hate Site Kiwi Farms
short_description: Cloudflare CEO Matthew Prince had previously resisted calls to block the site.

headline: Bear Spotted Chilling In California Swimming Pool
short_description: "He's welcome in my yard as long as he doesn't kill me or my family," the homeowner quipped.
